description: Perfect for the on-the-go financial professional!  ||  Upward Mobility's FINRA Series 63 Exam Prep app for Palm webOS contains 251 focused questions to thoroughly prepare you for the NASAA Uniform Securities Agent State Law Examination.  Each question is paired with a concise yet thorough explanation to ensure comprehension of the material.  All content was created exclusively for Upward Mobility by an expert writer with a strong financial background and comprehensive knowledge of the material on the exam and edited by Samantha Tanzer, an Upward Mobility associate with a background in financial regulation.   ||  The app has both a "study mode" where each question is followed by a clear explanation of the answer and a "test mode" where the users can simulate the exam experience and test their recall ability.  ||  This app covers all of subject areas presented on the Series 63 exam, including registration of persons, securities, business practice, and administrative provisions and other remedies as well as critical vocabulary.  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.  ||  Upward Mobility is not affiliated with and this app is not endorsed by FINRA.
